page.title: 07THE A5 TODAY
page.content: The A5 is one of the main trunk roads in the area and carries a considerable volume of traffic. At peak times during the day it becomes particulary conjested causing major delays in traffic flow. During the summer months this problem becomes intensified with people travelling to North Wales and especially with day trippers to Drayton Manor Park. Complaints from local people concerning problems caused by the road include long traffic delays,considerable noise and some pollution, extreme danger for children and old people, and general problems for pedestrians who encounter long waits in their attempts to cross the A5.
